In its half century of existence, our college has grown from three programs to a top-ranked, research-based business school with an international reputation. We have built highly regarded departments in all areas and continue to be recognized by the business community for our outstanding graduates.  We are UIC Business because of you and your support!        A Message from Dean Mikhail       Connect With Us            Give Now            Update Your Information          Upcoming Events              UIC Business Alumni   As a UIC Business alum, you are one of more than 37,000 men and women who are linked to an influential business network. Even after graduation, our alumni continue to be actively involved with UIC Business and its students – both on and off campus.  UIC Business alumni serve as mentors for current students, as volunteer in Alumni 4 U, and speakers for the Executives in the Classroom and the Business Career Center . They host students at their place of work or take them out to dinner for networking opportunities.  They love UIC Business and the opportunities it presented to them, so they make every effort to keep their Flames spirit alive by giving students access to experiences that enhance their business education.      Take Their Word for It:    I believe supporting UIC, a top educational institution in Chicago and the nation, is a privilege and a duty. UIC equips our youths’ future through a rigorous academic and social conscience education.    Loida Rosario | Class of '86        Business Advisory Council   UIC Business enjoys support from a Business Advisory Council that works with the dean to provide: ambassadorship and advocacy, pre-professional mentoring of UIC Business undergraduates, and practical business perspectives and advice.  The BAC is composed of leaders from the business world including UIC Business alumni as well as friends who attended other colleges.  For more information, please contact Michaela Smith Esboldt, Assistant Director of Engagement and Participation at UIC Business, at mmsmith1@uic.edu or (312) 996-5916.
